ncrsDetermination.abcd:InformalNameString: Mineralized monzonite porphyry dike, "Black cat" claim. Chrysocolla and shattuckite (Azure bue glassy mineral)
Chrysocolla-Quartz vein in Granite-Porphyry area on the north side of the disseminated orebody. Principally mined for smelter flux. Allophane and Halloysite are usually associate minerals
